title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, run and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with convenient async/sync helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with builder-style API and async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Terminal UI built with Rich and Textual for interactive Ollama chats and model handling.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or rankers in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and streaming support, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines and reproducible testing.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, used internally by the CLI and available as a module.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-compatible UI that can also connect to an Ollama backend for local model chatting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run Ollama models on selected notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.
